description: Turn a can of salmon into delicious salmon fish cakes with this recipe. Serve these patties with a salad for lunch or as a starter before dinner.
name: Salmon Fish Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Working in batches, cook patties for 4 minutes on each side or until golden. Serve fish cakes with mixed leaves, lemon wedges and aioli.
